mapper.select: select e030.event_use_id, e030.event_id, e030.event_user_id, (select m010.member_name from tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 where m010.member_id = e030.event_user_id ) member_name, e030.used_date, e030.use_amount, e030.use_comment, e030.use_receipt_id, e030.use_receipt_name, e030.use_subject, (select m010.member_name from tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_event020 e020 on vi.id_path_priortiy = e020.event_id and e020.event_pay_level = e030.pay_current_step and m010.member_id = e020.event_pay_user_id) pay_name, e030.USE_PRO_STATUS, (select cd_v_meaning from tb_s020.tb_s020_code010 where cd_tp = 'USE_PRO_STATUS' and cd_v = e030.USE_PRO_STATUS and CATEGORY = '000') USE_PRO_STATUS_nm from tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_event020 e020 on m010.member_id = e020.event_pay_user_id inner join event_hierarchy_view vi on e020.event_id = vi.id_path_priortiy inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_event030 e030 on e030.event_id = vi.event_id and e030.pay_current_step = e020.event_pay_level where vi.event_code = #{eventCode} and m010.member_id = #{eventPayUserId} and vi.pay_flag = 'Y' and vi.event_final_flag = 'Y' and e030.use_pro_status in ('A', 'B') and e030.USED_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
